text: From 1906 to 1926, the Finnish Swimming Federation did not arrange a dedicated national competition, but spread out the hosting duties of the championship events to multiple clubs. Few of the championship events were held before the opening of the World War I prompted the federation to cancel them. == Diving == === Men === ==== Plain ==== Competed in Helsinki on 2 August 1914. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
